price: (Ó jẹ́) ìkẹ́ kan láti ọ̀dọ̀ Wa. Báyẹn ni A ṣe ń san ẹ̀san fún ẹni tó bá dúpẹ́ (fún Wa).
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
